title: S17 Ep18: The Empires of Atlantis w/ Marco Vigato
itunes:title: The Empires of Atlantis w/ Marco Vigato
description:
Darkness Radio presents: The Empires of Atlantis with Author, Marco Vigato!

Marco Vigato joins us to show that Atlantis did not vanish but survived in a variety of different forms well into the historical era!  He also tells us how Atlantean survivors restarted civilization i the world, and how they may have been mistaken for ... ALIENS! 

Get The Empires of Atlantis here:  https://amzn.to/3JiPpu0
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
